import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get User Followed Collections"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/me/following/collections"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Browse collections the currently authenticated user is following. Successful request will return an array of [Mod Collection Objects](/restapi/docs/schemas/mod-collection-object).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Origin","in":"header","description":"Origin of request.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"example":"https://mod.io"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
